title: World Development Indicators - Complete Dataset
description: The World Development Indicators (WDI) is the World Bank's premier compilation of cross-country comparable data on development. This dataset contains ALL available indicators from the WDI database - approximately 1,500 time series indicators for 217 economies and more than 40 country groups, with complete historical data (many indicators have data going back to 1960 or earlier). The indicators span topics including poverty, education, health, environment, economy, trade, and private sector development.
